wikipedia_page.main: Blair Currie (born 19 February 1994) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Stirling Albion.

link_mentions.page: List of Hamilton Academical F.C. players

response: He is now the goalkeeper coach at Hamilton Academical and was registered as a player in April 2014 as emergency cover for Kevin Cuthbert and Blair Currie.
